content: Download {{organizationName}} Documents on the App Store

comment.text: This translation key is used for the "Download {{organizationName}} Documents on the App Store" text displayed in an app store download button. The button likely appears when users tap or click within a specific UI component, such as a component marked as `onClick` event handler, to prompt them to download organization-specific documents from the App Store.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'من' (min) translates to 'from'. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing in Arabic would use a word that implies obtaining or accessing, not just being 'from'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: حمّل {{organizationName}} Documents من خلال/عبر متجر Apple

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The German translation uses 'im AppStore' which is not standard. It should be 'im App Store'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Laden Sie {{organizationName}} Documents im App Store herunter

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "Dփաստաթղթերը" seems to be a misspelling or incomplete Armenian word. It likely intends to represent "Documents".
The Portuguese translation uses 'Faça o download' which is a bit formal for an app store description. A more natural phrasing might be preferred.
The translation 'බාගන්නන්න' is overly informal and sounds awkward in this context. A more formal and appropriate verb for 'download' in this situation would be 'ගන්නා' or 'බාගත'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{organizationName}} ලේඛන ඇප් ස්ටෝర్‌లో ගන්නා or {{organizationName}} ලේඛන ඇප් ස්ටෝర్‌లో බාගත

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "App Store-у" is using an incorrect case/form.  It's a genitive case, but the more common and natural phrasing for a title or link would use the nominative case: "App Store".
The translation 'Docs' for 'Documents' is too literal and doesn't convey the full meaning in a natural way in Chinese. 'Documents' refers to a collection of files.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 在App Store上下载{{organizationName}} 的文件

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically not incorrect, adding a particle before “文件” (file) would read more naturally.  Consider adding 的.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 在App Store上下载{{organizationName}} 的文件
